DATABASE_URL.description: PostgreSQL connection string from Vercel Postgres

PAYLOAD_SECRET.description: Secret key for Payload CMS (minimum 32 characters, generate with: openssl rand -base64 32)

NEXT_PUBLIC_SERVER_URL.description: Public URL of your application (e.g., https://your-app.vercel.app)

BLOB_READ_WRITE_TOKEN.description: Vercel Blob storage read/write token (optional, for file uploads)
